channel.title: Projects on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Home

item.title: Project 5: Bollywood Movie Recommendation Engine
item.description: The data was scraped from wikipedia using beautifulsoup. Data was prepared using pandas and visualized using matplotlib. Analysis and data preparation was done thoroughly. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 4: HR Analytics & Modeling
item.description: The data was collected from kaggle. Data was prepared using pandas and visualized using matplotlib & seaborn. Analysis was done thoroughly. Tried KNN, DecisionTree, LogisticRegression. And DecisionTree classifier algorithm was choosen with accuracy of 97%. Link to Notebook

item.title: Project 3: Salary Classifier
item.description: The data was collected from kaggle. Data was prepared using pandas and visualized using matplotlib. Analysis was done thoroughly. Tried KNN, SVM, DecisionTree, LogisticRegression, RandomForest, AdaBoost, GaussianNB Algorithm. And AdaBoost classifier algorithm was choosen with accuracy of 81%. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: Car Price Prediction
item.description: The data was collected from kaggle. Data was prepared using pandas and visualized using matplotlib. Prediction was done using LinearRegression, model accuracy 84%. Web frame used was django. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 1: Bangalore price prediction
item.description: The data was collected from kaggle. Data was prepared using pandas and visualized using matplotlib. Prediction was done using LinearRegression, model accuracy 89%. Web frame used was flask. Locally hosted using Nginx. Link to GitHub Repository
